byline.contributor: Dan Bilefsky reported from Paris, and Melissa Eddy from Berlin. Aurelien Breeden contributed reporting from Paris.
byline.original: By DAN BILEFSKY and MELISSA EDDY

lead_paragraph: As officials warned of possible power failures and encouraged people to view the phenomenon only through special glasses, excitement grew for the rare celestial event.

headline.main: Europeans (Carefully) Gaze Upward for Glimpse of the Solar Eclipse
headline.print_headline: Europeans (Carefully) Gaze Upward for Glimpse of the Solar Eclipse

snippet: As officials warned of possible power failures and encouraged people to view the phenomenon only through special glasses, excitement grew for the rare celestial event.
